fields.name: Area tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}area list`: List all available areas
`{{prefix}}area add newyork`: This command would add the 'newyork' area to the list of areas you are interested in
`{{prefix}}area remove newyork`: This command would remove 'newyork' from areas that you were interested in

embed.title: Poracle Help
embed.description:
Thank you for registering 
Please set a location `{{prefix}}location name of place` or add areas where to receive alarms from

fields.name: Monster tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}track snorlax lapras d500 iv50-90 cp1000 level15`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about snorlax and lapras within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require them to have IV between 50% - 90% be at least level 15 and minimum CP of 1000 
`{{prefix}}track everything great1-3 greatcp1450 clean`: This command would alert you about all pvp mons and evolutions in your area, with an Rank between 1-3, a minimum final CP of 1450 and clean message after despawn. 
`{{prefix}}untrack lapras vileplume`: will remove tracking for lapras and vileplume

fields.name: Raid tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}raid snorlax lapras d500 instinct`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about snorlax and lapras raids within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct 
`{{prefix}}raid remove lapras vileplume`: will remove tracking for lapras and vileplume raids

fields.name: Raid tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}raid snorlax lapras d500 instinct`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about snorlax and lapras raids within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct 
`{{prefix}}raid remove lapras vileplume`: will remove tracking for lapras and vileplume raids

fields.name: Lure tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}lure magnetic glacial d500`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about normal and glacial within 500 meters of your location.
`{{prefix}}lure remove everything`: will remove tracking for all lures

fields.name: Invasion tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}invasion template3 d500 dragon mixed`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about Team Rocket Incidents within 500m of your location if the grunt type was mixed or dragon. You can use any pokemon type name.
 `{{prefix}}invasion remove everything` Removes tracking for all Team Rocket Incidents.

fields.name: Raid egg tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}egg level3 d500 instinct`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about level 3 raid eggs within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct 
`{{prefix}}egg remove level3`: will remove tracking for level 3 raid eggs

fields.name: Quest tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}quest porygon pikachu poké_ball d500 `: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about Quests obtainable within 500m of your location with porygon, pikachu or pokéballs as rewards 
 `{{prefix}}quest remove all_items` Removes tracking for all item based quests. Can also use `all_pokemon` or `stardust`

fields.name: Gym tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}gym instinct slot_changes`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about gyms inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct and slot changes occur
`{{prefix}}gym remove instinct`: Removes tracking for all gyms controlled by team Instinct

fields.name: Discord Role commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}role list`: Lists all available Discord Roles.
`{{prefix}}role add <areaname>`: Adds a Discord role to your configuration.
`{{prefix}}role membership`: Overview of all roles from your configuration.
`{{prefix}}role remove <areaname>`: Removes the Discord role from your configuration.
